item.title: qureate announces 2026 to 2027 lineup: Bunny Garden 2, Tokyo Valkyries, Splash Girls, and more
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Bunny Garden 2 due out this spring.

qureate has announced its lineup for 2026 to 2027, including Bunny Garden 2, Tokyo Valkyries, Splash Girls, the tentatively titled “Messy Room Girlfriend Project,” and a second Bunny Garden spin-off following Merry Bunny Garden.

Here is the full lineup of titles:

Bunny Garden 2

  • Release Date: Spring 2026

The latest entry in the Bunny Garden series is scheduled for release in spring 2026. As a romance adventure game where you can deepen your relationships with a unique cast of girls while visiting the gentleman’s sanctuary “Bunny Garden,” this brand-new title carries over the charm of the previous game while evolving even further.

In addition to the return of familiar characters such as Kana, Rin, and Miuka, Erisa (voiced by Yukina Shuto), who left a strong impression despite only appearing in the background in the previous game, will newly join the cast, bringing even more excitement to “Bunny Garden.” Furthermore, new characters are also planned to appear, promising an even more intimate experience than the previous title.

Please look forward to this brand-new title, where the world of Bunny Garden expands in deeper and more captivating ways. Stay tuned for more updates.

Tokyo Valkyries

  • Platforms: Switch, PC
  • Release Date: 2026
  • Genre: Roguelite deckbuilder game

Tokyo Valkyries is a roguelite deckbuilder where you build your deck, devise strategies, and progress through the map while defeating the enemies that stand in your way. One day, another world known as the “Other World” emerges in Tokyo, encroaching upon reality. Only a chosen group of girls can stand against this strange phenomenon. Will they be able to protect Tokyo from the encroachment of the Other World?

Scheduled for release in 2026. Stay tuned for more updates.

Splash Girls

  • Platforms: Switch, PC
  • Release Date: 2026

Splash Girls is an exhilarating shooting action game in which you must save girls who have grown gigantic due to a mysterious virus. Players wield a vaccine-firing gun and a massive syringe to stand against the rampaging virus. The only thing that can save these giant girls is your extra-thick injection!? An flashy rescue mission of extraordinary scale and intensity is about to begin.

Scheduled for release in 2026. Stay tuned for more updates.

Messy Room Girlfriend Project (title tentative)

  • Release Date: 2027

Make a messy room sparkle with your own hands! And maybe even your girlfriend’s heart…!?

Currently in development for a 2027 release. Stay tuned for more updates.

Bunny Garden Spin-Off #2

  • Release Date: To be announced

Following Merry Bunny Garden, the second Bunny Garden spin-off is currently in development. Please look forward to the next challenge awaiting the Bunny Garden cast.

Watch a trailer below.

qureate 2026 to 2027 Title Lineup Trailer
